c74object.name: abc.hoa.stereodecoder~
c74object.digest: Abclib's 2D High Order Ambisonics (HOA) Stereo Encoder
c74object.description: abc.hoa.stereoencoder~ enable to diffuse a stereo source in ambisonics using two encoders with an opening angle in degrees (initialized to 60 degrees).

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1:min=1:max=7:step=1].

attribute.name: angle
attribute.description: sets the opening angle between the two sources of the stereo in degree [init=0:min=-360:max=360:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the opening angle of the stereo in degree

method.name: angle
method.description: sets the opening angle between the two sources of the stereo in degree [init=0:min=-360:max=360:step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the opening angle of the stereo in degree
